content.rendered:
It can be hard at times to find something to write about. Motivation can be hard to come by and it can seem like the ink well of inspiration can be dry. There is still hope. There are things that we can do to come up with ideas.

For one, we can watch our favorite movie. Maybe there are some things that it can teach us and that we might want to write about it.

A walk might inspire us to write about something. I wrote a poem based on what I saw in the clouds and in the sky. It doesn’t have to be complicated. Some times we just need to write.

We can spend time with a friend or family member. We can talk, but it may be better if we just listen or ask questions.

We an brainstorm ideas of what to write about. Take five minutes just to write things down that might be of interest.

It’s not just true of writers. Painters and musicians can sometimes Ron low on inspiration. Some times we just need to get away from our craft for a while and experience life so that when we go back to the drawing board, so to speak, we fell refreshed. Other times, we just need to get at whatever we want to do. Inspiration can come with doing the work. Editing can come later.
